item.title: Bill Clinton scheduled to appear before Oversight Committee as contempt of Congress threat looms
item.description: Bill Clinton faces contempt threat as House Oversight Committee demands his appearance in Epstein probe. Republicans warn of criminal referral proceed...

item.title: Bipartisan lawmakers propose bill to block military action against NATO members amid threats to take Greenland
item.description: A group of bipartisan lawmakers introduced legislation to block President Donald Trump from invading a NATO country or territory, including Greenland.

item.title: Rep Ro Khanna demands prosecution of ICE agent in Minneapolis fatal shooting

item.title: Jack Smith to testify next week at a public House Judiciary Committee hearing

item.title: Nonprofit revenue totals surge amid growing scrutiny after major fraud cases
item.description: Nonprofits reported hundreds of billions in revenue as major fraud cases spark scrutiny of taxpayer-funded programs across multiple states in 2024.
